Greenes funeralls. By RB. Gent Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?, attributed author. Barnfield, Richard, 1574-1627, attributed author.
[24] p.
By Iohn Danter, and are to be sold at his house in hosier-lane nere holbourne-conduit, Printed at London : 1594.
Attributed to Richard Barnfield and Nicholas Breton. In verse. Signatures: A-C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
